Package org.openlca.util

Class Strings

java.lang.Object
org.openlca.util.Strings
public class Strings extends Object
Contains helper methods for string operations.

  • Method Details

    • cut

      public static String cut​(String string, int length)
      Cut a string to the given length. Appends "..." if the string was truncated.

    • cutLeft

      public static String cutLeft​(String s, int len)

    • readLines

      public static String[] readLines​(InputStream is) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • nullOrEqual

      public static boolean nullOrEqual​(String string1, String string2)
      Returns true if both of the given strings are null or if both of the given strings are equal.

    • nullOrEmpty

      public static boolean nullOrEmpty​(String val)
      Returns true if the given string value is null or empty.

    • notEmpty

      public static boolean notEmpty​(String val)
      Returns true if the string is not null or empty, means that it contains other characters than white-spaces.

    • compare

      public static int compare​(String str1, String str2)
      A null-save method for comparing two strings ignoring the case.

    • join

      public static <T> String join​(Collection<T> values, char delimiter)

      public static String join​(String[] values, char delimiter)

    • prepend

      public static String[] prepend​(String[] array, String value)

    • orEmpty

      public static String orEmpty​(String s)
      Returns the empty string if the given string is null. Otherwise the given string is returned.

    • nullIfEmpty

      public static String nullIfEmpty​(String s)
      Returns null if the given string is empty or contains only whitespaces, otherwise it returns the unchanged string.
